content: I remember my car was making a weird noise when I accelerated, which is why I finally got it serviced last Saturday. The mechanic told me I needed to replace the air filter, which was causing my gas mileage to suffer. I'm glad I got it done, especially since I've been driving a lot more lately. Anyway, back to Yosemite - if I do decide to rent a 4WD or AWD vehicle, do you think I'll need to get any special insurance or permits?
